habitat.terrain: lush forests interspersed with shimmering lakes

abilities.primary: ability to manipulate moonlight for camouflage and healing

behavior.patterns: nocturnal, active during the night and resting in hidden groves during the day
behavior.social_structure: live in small, tight-knit family groups led by the eldest female

lore.origin_story: The Lunarae were born from the tears of the Moon Goddess, who wept for the beauty of the night sky.

legends.title: The Dance of the Moonlit Spirits
legends.summary: A tale of how the Lunarae once danced with the stars, bringing light to the darkest nights.
